articles.contents:
Quantitative Digital Methods

          Joshua
          Protocols
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Joshua Eisenstat
          
          
            
              I am a PhD Student in Sociology at New York University. I study the politics of software and relationship labor. I love talking about drag artists, Jewish witchcraft, and heterodox computational social science.
            
            
              I am a PhD Student in Sociology at New York University. I study the politics of software and relationship labor. articles.title: Untitled
articles.description: A new article created using the Distill format.
articles.contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
